attributes.action: Force Major banks to lend bale out money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This year, major banks were baled out for a sum of nearly £60 billion of taxpayer money, This money has not yet filtered through to be lent to the public. (Lack of lending being what caused the crisis).

It is time to MAKE the greedy CEO's start to put money to good use.

This recession can be healed a lot quicker if Lloyds TSB, HBOS, RBS and many others would put their money where their mouth is.

Sign this petition and rescue our economy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
